credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
title: Sandy Beach with Breakers
provenance: Gift of Mrs. Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description: Horizontal view of seacoast: dark blue ocean with green-blue white-capped breakers rolling from the middleground into a neutral gray-yellow sandy beach with brown tracks and rows at water's edge in the foreground, as a dark blue-gray sky with clouds is seen in the distance.
name: Painting
